definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
sweet given on a happy occasion (esp. wedding)

sentences.english: A wooden passenger car was abandoned at back yard of Wu-Shu-Lin Depot.
sentences.chinese: 废弃于乌树林车库后方的糖铁木制客车。

sentences.english: The preserved Sugar Railway Chi-Shan Station.
sentences.chinese: 被保存下来的糖铁旗山车站。

sentences.english: The supplies of sugar have been running low,causing a rise in the price.
sentences.chinese: 糖的供应日渐短缺，从而引起价格的上涨。

sentences.english: We went to see Coach, and she showed us how to collect sap too.
sentences.chinese: 我们去看教练，然后她也告诉了我们怎样采集糖树汁。

sentences.english: In theory, ke- rose can be reduced to obtain a couple of sugar alcohols which are epimers and have the same molecular weight.
sentences.chinese: 酮糖被还原时理论上生成一对等量的差向异构体糖醇。

sentences.english: The stuff in the sugar bowl. We’re not talking about complex carbohydrates, which are merely long strings of sugars.
sentences.chinese: 我们不讨论碳水化合物，那是一长串糖的合成物。

sentences.english: He ate a bar of candy and then asked for another.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了一块糖，然后又要了一块。

sentences.english: Aunt is ready for you to eat the teeth do not hurt the sugar, to taste, welcome to.
sentences.chinese: 阿姨准备了适合你吃不伤牙齿的糖，欢迎到时来尝尝。

sentences.english: So get all sources of sweets, deserts and sugar out of your house.
sentences.chinese: 把各种各样的糖果，甜点和其他糖移出你的房间。

sentences.english: Glucocorticoid plus CTX may be used to treat lupus-like hepatitis with caution.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮质激素联合CTX治疗狼疮样肝炎可以慎用。

sentences.english: It could be the name of a lolly , or a game.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是一种棒糖或是一种游戏的名字。

sentences.english: Sugar and vinegar are seasonings of this sparerib soup.
sentences.chinese: 糖和醋是做这道排骨汤的辅料。

sentences.english: Add sugar and milk to taste.
sentences.chinese: 加入少量的牛奶和糖，味道更佳。

sentences.english: The little girl will get a candy if she gives a right answer.
sentences.chinese: 若小女孩问闭于问题就可以失到一颗糖。

sentences.english: Burnt sugar, used for coloring and sweetening foods.
sentences.chinese: 烧焦的糖，用于为食物染色并使之变甜。

sentences.english: People with diabetes suffer from improper metabolism of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病人的糖代谢受到阻碍。
